column10: "(204) Table HNCONSULT_HEADER Error: String or binary data would be truncated.\r\nThe statement has been terminated.; Command : UPDATE HNCONSULT_HEADER SET REQUESTNO = N'COI25-0010',CXLDATETIME = '2025-4-29 16:6:59:744',CXLBYUSERCODE = N'JOKEYMED',CXLREASONCODE = N'CXL-001',AN = N'6755509',TODOCTOR = N'100',TODEPARTMENT = N'1100' WHERE  RequestNo = N'COI25-0010' "
